mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAY0037D (REF_NO,REF_CODE,ID,ITM_ID,APPR_CODE) VALUES ( (CASE WHEN LENGTH(#{refNo}) < 7 THEN LPAD(#{refNo},7,'0') WHEN LENGTH(#{refNo}) > 7 THEN LPAD(#{refNo},14,'0') ELSE #{refNo} END ), (CASE WHEN #{refCode} IS NULL THEN #{refCode} WHEN #{refCode} = 'A' THEN LPAD(#{refCode},3,'0') WHEN LENGTH(#{refCode}) < 2 THEN LPAD(#{refCode},2,'0') ELSE #{refCode} END ), #{id}, #{itemId}, #{apprCode} )

INSERT INTO PAY0037D (REF_NO,REF_CODE,ID,ITM_ID,APPR_CODE)
SELECT #{item.refNo}, #{item.refCode}, #{item.id}, #{item.itemId}, #{item.apprCode} FROM DUAL
mapper.update: UPDATE PAY0037D SET REF_NO = (CASE WHEN LENGTH(REF_NO) < 7 THEN LPAD(REF_NO,7,'0') WHEN LENGTH(REF_NO) > 7 THEN LPAD(REF_NO,16,'0') ELSE REF_NO END ), REF_CODE = (CASE WHEN REF_CODE IS NULL THEN REF_CODE WHEN REF_CODE = 'A' THEN LPAD(REF_CODE,3,'0') WHEN LENGTH(REF_CODE) < 2 THEN LPAD(REF_CODE,2,'0') ELSE REF_CODE END ) WHERE ID = #{ctrlId}
UPDATE PAY0037D SET ITM_ID = '' WHERE ID = #{ctrlId}
mapper.select: SELECT ID AS CTRL_ID, COUNT(1) AS TOTAL_ITEM, SUM(CASE WHEN REF_CODE IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS TOTAL_SUCCESS, SUM(CASE WHEN REF_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS TOTAL_FAIL FROM PAY0037D WHERE ID = #{ctrlId} GROUP BY ID

SELECT ID AS CTRL_ID, COUNT(1) AS TOTAL_ITEM, SUM(CASE WHEN REF_CODE = '00' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS TOTAL_SUCCESS, SUM(CASE WHEN REF_CODE IS NULL OR REF_CODE != '00' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS TOTAL_FAIL FROM PAY0037D WHERE ID = #{ctrlId} GROUP BY ID
mapper.update: UPDATE PAY0041D SET CTRL_WAIT_SYNC = 1 , UPD_DT = SYSDATE , UPD_USER_ID = #{userId} WHERE CTRL_ID = #{ctrlId}
mapper.select: SELECT CTRL_ID , CTRL_BATCH_NO , CTRL_BANK_ID , TO_CHAR(CTRL_BATCH_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CTRL_BATCH_DT , CTRL_BILL_AMT , CTRL_BILL_PAY_AMT , CTRL_IS_CLOS , CTRL_STUS_ID , CRT_USER_ID , CRT_DT , UPD_DT , UPD_USER_ID , CTRL_IS_CRC , CTRL_FAIL_SMS_IS_PUMP , CTRL_TOT_ITM , CTRL_TOT_SUCCES , CTRL_TOT_FAIL , CTRL_WAIT_SYNC , CTRL_DDT_CHL FROM PAY0041D WHERE CTRL_ID = #{ctrlId}

SELECT Extent1.BANK_DTL_ID, Extent1.BANK_DTL_CTRL_ID, Extent1.SALES_ORD_ID, TO_CHAR(Extent1.BANK_DTL_DR_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BANK_DTL_DR_DT, Extent1.BANK_DTL_DR_BANK_TYPE_ID, regexp_substr (Extent1.BANK_DTL_DR_ACC_NO, '[^[:space:]]+') BANK_DTL_DR_ACC_NO, regexp_substr (Extent1.BANK_DTL_DR_NAME, '[^[:cntrl:]]+') BANK_DTL_DR_NAME, Extent1.BANK_DTL_AMT , Extent1.BANK_DTL_APPR_CODE AS BANK_DTL_APPR_CODE , Extent1.BANK_DTL_OR_NO , Extent1.CRT_USER_ID , Extent1.CRT_DT , Extent1.UPD_USER_ID , Extent1.UPD_DT , regexp_substr (Extent1.BANK_DTL_DR_NRIC, '[^[:space:]]+') BANK_DTL_DR_NRIC, Extent1.BANK_DTL_OR_NO_RPT , Extent1.BANK_DTL_REN_STUS , Extent1.SVC_CNTRCT_ID , Extent1.BANK_DTL_BANK_ID , (CASE WHEN Extent1.BANK_APPV IS NOT NULL THEN Extent1.BANK_APPV ELSE 0 END) AS BANK_APPV, (CASE WHEN Extent1.BANK_DTL_APPR_DT IS NOT NULL THEN TO_CHAR(Extent1.BANK_DTL_APPR_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') ELSE '1900-01-01' END) AS BANK_DTL_APPR_DT , (CASE WHEN Extent2.BIC IS NOT NULL THEN Extent2.BIC ELSE ' ' END) AS BIC , (CASE WHEN Extent1.BANK_DTL_FPX_ID IS NOT NULL THEN Extent1.BANK_DTL_FPX_ID ELSE 0 END) AS BANK_DTL_FPX_ID, CASE WHEN Extent5.F_PX_ID IS NOT NULL THEN Extent5.CODE ELSE ' ' END AS FPX_CODE , TRIM(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO) SALES_ORD_NO , (CASE WHEN Extent1.BANK_DTL_RPT_AMT IS NOT NULL THEN Extent1.BANK_DTL_RPT_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS BANK_DTL_RPT_AMT , (CASE WHEN Extent1.BANK_DTL_REN_AMT IS NOT NULL THEN Extent1.BANK_DTL_REN_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS BANK_DTL_REN_AMT , (CASE WHEN Extent1.BANK_DTL_CRC_EXPR IS NOT NULL THEN Extent1.BANK_DTL_CRC_EXPR ELSE ' ' END) AS BANK_DTL_CRC_EXPR , (CASE WHEN Extent4.SRV_CNTRCT_ID IS NOT NULL THEN TRIM(Extent4.SRV_CNTRCT_REF_NO) ELSE ' ' END) AS SRV_CNTRCT_REF_NO , (CASE WHEN Extent4.SRV_CNTRCT_ID IS NOT NULL THEN SUBSTR(TRIM(Extent4.SRV_CNTRCT_REF_NO), 5, 7) || TRIM(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO) ELSE TRIM(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO) END) AS BILL_NO, case when Extent1.DD_PAYMENT_ID IS NOT NULL THEN Extent1.DD_PAYMENT_ID ELSE (CASE WHEN NVL( Extent1.SVC_CNTRCT_ID,0) > 0 THEN (CASE WHEN LENGTH(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO) < 7 THEN SUBSTR(TRIM(Extent4.SRV_CNTRCT_REF_NO),5,7) || '0' || TRIM(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO) ELSE SUBSTR(TRIM(Extent4.SRV_CNTRCT_REF_NO),5,7) || TRIM(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO) END ) ELSE (CASE WHEN LENGTH(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO) = 7 AND SUBSTR(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO,0,1) = '0' THEN TRIM(SUBSTR(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO,2,LENGTH(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO))) ELSE TRIM(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO) END) END)END AS CNTRCT_N_ORD_NO, Extent6.BANK_ACH_CODE, Extent2.CODE FROM PAY0042D Extent1 LEFT JOIN SYS0004M Extent2 ON Extent2.BANK_ID = Extent1.BANK_DTL_BANK_ID JOIN SAL0001D Extent3 ON Extent3.SALES_ORD_ID = Extent1.SALES_ORD_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0077D Extent4 ON Extent4.SRV_CNTRCT_ID = Extent1.SVC_CNTRCT_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0090C Extent5 ON Extent5.F_PX_ID = Extent1.BANK_DTL_FPX_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0093M Extent6 ON Extent2.BANK_ID = Extent6.BANK_ID WHERE Extent1.BANK_DTL_CTRL_ID = #{ctrlId} ORDER BY Extent1.BANK_DTL_DR_ACC_NO ASC

SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM PAY0042D Extent1 LEFT JOIN SYS0004M Extent2 ON Extent2.BANK_ID = Extent1.BANK_DTL_BANK_ID JOIN SAL0001D Extent3 ON Extent3.SALES_ORD_ID = Extent1.SALES_ORD_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0077D Extent4 ON Extent4.SRV_CNTRCT_ID = Extent1.SVC_CNTRCT_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0090C Extent5 ON Extent5.F_PX_ID = Extent1.BANK_DTL_FPX_ID WHERE Extent1.BANK_DTL_CTRL_ID = #{ctrlId}
SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM PAY0287D Extent1 WHERE Extent1.BANK_DTL_CTRL_ID = #{ctrlId}

SELECT COUNT(1) CNT FROM ( SELECT FILE_BATCH_CRT_DT CRT_DT FROM PAY0245M WHERE TO_CHAR(FILE_BATCH_CRT_DT,'YYYY/MM/DD hh:mi:ss A.M.') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD hh:mi:ss A.M.') AND FILE_BATCH_BANK_ID = 19 AND FILE_BATCH_STUS_ID IN (1,4) UNION SELECT CRT_DT FROM PAY0041D WHERE TO_CHAR(CRT_DT,'YYYY/MM/DD hh:mi:ss A.M.') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') AND TO_CHAR(CRT_DT,'YYYY/MM/DD hh:mi:ss A.M.') AND CTRL_BANK_ID = 19 AND CTRL_STUS_ID IN (1,4) )

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM ,Z.* FROM ( SELECT Extent1.BANK_DTL_ID, Extent1.BANK_DTL_CTRL_ID, Extent1.SALES_ORD_ID, TO_CHAR(Extent1.BANK_DTL_DR_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BANK_DTL_DR_DT, Extent1.BANK_DTL_DR_BANK_TYPE_ID, Extent1.BANK_DTL_DR_ACC_NO AS BANK_DTL_DR_ACC_NO, Extent1.BANK_DTL_DR_NAME , Extent1.BANK_DTL_AMT , Extent1.BANK_DTL_APPR_CODE AS BANK_DTL_APPR_CODE , Extent1.BANK_DTL_OR_NO , Extent1.CRT_USER_ID , Extent1.CRT_DT , Extent1.UPD_USER_ID , Extent1.UPD_DT , Extent1.BANK_DTL_DR_NRIC , Extent1.BANK_DTL_OR_NO_RPT , Extent1.BANK_DTL_REN_STUS , Extent1.SVC_CNTRCT_ID , Extent1.BANK_DTL_BANK_ID , (CASE WHEN Extent1.BANK_APPV IS NOT NULL THEN Extent1.BANK_APPV ELSE 0 END) AS BANK_APPV, (CASE WHEN Extent1.BANK_DTL_APPR_DT IS NOT NULL THEN TO_CHAR(Extent1.BANK_DTL_APPR_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') ELSE '1900-01-01' END) AS BANK_DTL_APPR_DT , (CASE WHEN Extent2.BIC IS NOT NULL THEN Extent2.BIC ELSE ' ' END) AS BIC , (CASE WHEN Extent1.BANK_DTL_FPX_ID IS NOT NULL THEN Extent1.BANK_DTL_FPX_ID ELSE 0 END) AS BANK_DTL_FPX_ID, CASE WHEN Extent5.F_PX_ID IS NOT NULL THEN Extent5.CODE ELSE ' ' END AS FPX_CODE , TRIM(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO) SALES_ORD_NO , (CASE WHEN Extent1.BANK_DTL_RPT_AMT IS NOT NULL THEN Extent1.BANK_DTL_RPT_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS BANK_DTL_RPT_AMT , (CASE WHEN Extent1.BANK_DTL_REN_AMT IS NOT NULL THEN Extent1.BANK_DTL_REN_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS BANK_DTL_REN_AMT , (CASE WHEN Extent1.BANK_DTL_CRC_EXPR IS NOT NULL THEN Extent1.BANK_DTL_CRC_EXPR ELSE ' ' END) AS BANK_DTL_CRC_EXPR , (CASE WHEN Extent4.SRV_CNTRCT_ID IS NOT NULL THEN TRIM(Extent4.SRV_CNTRCT_REF_NO) ELSE ' ' END) AS SRV_CNTRCT_REF_NO , (CASE WHEN Extent4.SRV_CNTRCT_ID IS NOT NULL THEN SUBSTR(TRIM(Extent4.SRV_CNTRCT_REF_NO), 5, 7) || TRIM(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO) ELSE TRIM(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO) END) AS BILL_NO, (CASE WHEN NVL( Extent1.SVC_CNTRCT_ID,0) > 0 THEN (CASE WHEN LENGTH(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO) < 7 THEN SUBSTR(TRIM(Extent4.SRV_CNTRCT_REF_NO),5,7) || '0' || TRIM(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO) ELSE SUBSTR(TRIM(Extent4.SRV_CNTRCT_REF_NO),5,7) || TRIM(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO) END ) ELSE (CASE WHEN LENGTH(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO) = 7 AND SUBSTR(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO,0,1) = '0' THEN TRIM(SUBSTR(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO,2,LENGTH(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO))) ELSE TRIM(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO) END) END) AS CNTRCT_N_ORD_NO , ( SELECT MAX(NVL (crc.CUST_CRC_EXPR, '0000')) RENT_PAY_CRC_EXPR FROM SAL0001D som JOIN SAL0074D rs ON rs.SALES_ORD_ID = som.SALES_ORD_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0028D crc ON crc.CUST_CRC_ID = rs.CUST_CRC_ID AND rs.CUST_CRC_ID <> 0 WHERE som.STUS_CODE_ID <> 10 AND rs.MODE_ID = 131 AND som.APP_TYPE_ID IN (66,1412) AND rs.BANK_ID IN (19,34,17,28,18,31,16,23) AND som.SALES_ORD_ID = Extent3.SALES_ORD_ID AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS RENT_PAY_CRC_EXPR FROM PAY0042D Extent1 LEFT JOIN SYS0004M Extent2 ON Extent2.BANK_ID = Extent1.BANK_DTL_BANK_ID JOIN SAL0001D Extent3 ON Extent3.SALES_ORD_ID = Extent1.SALES_ORD_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0077D Extent4 ON Extent4.SRV_CNTRCT_ID = Extent1.SVC_CNTRCT_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0090C Extent5 ON Extent5.F_PX_ID = Extent1.BANK_DTL_FPX_ID WHERE Extent1.BANK_DTL_CTRL_ID = #{ctrlId}
) Z WHERE ROWNUM <= ( #{pageNo} * #{rowCount}) ORDER BY BANK_DTL_ID ASC) WHERE RNUM > ((#{pageNo} - 1) * #{rowCount})

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM ,Z.* ,SUM(BANK_DTL_AMT) OVER (ORDER BY ROWNUM ROWS between 0 FOLLOWING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING) AS TOT_AMT ,COUNT(BANK_DTL_ID) OVER (ORDER BY ROWNUM ROWS between 0 FOLLOWING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING) AS TOT_ITM FROM ( SELECT Extent1.BANK_DTL_ID, Extent1.BANK_DTL_CTRL_ID, Extent1.SALES_ORD_ID, TO_CHAR(Extent1.BANK_DTL_DR_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BANK_DTL_DR_DT, Extent1.BANK_DTL_DR_BANK_TYPE_ID, Extent1.BANK_DTL_DR_ACC_NO AS BANK_DTL_DR_ACC_NO, Extent1.BANK_DTL_DR_NAME , Extent1.BANK_DTL_AMT , Extent1.BANK_DTL_APPR_CODE AS BANK_DTL_APPR_CODE , Extent1.BANK_DTL_OR_NO , Extent1.CRT_USER_ID , Extent1.CRT_DT , Extent1.UPD_USER_ID , Extent1.UPD_DT , Extent1.BANK_DTL_DR_NRIC , Extent1.BANK_DTL_OR_NO_RPT , Extent1.BANK_DTL_REN_STUS , Extent1.SVC_CNTRCT_ID , Extent1.BANK_DTL_BANK_ID , (CASE WHEN Extent1.BANK_APPV IS NOT NULL THEN Extent1.BANK_APPV ELSE 0 END) AS BANK_APPV, (CASE WHEN Extent1.BANK_DTL_APPR_DT IS NOT NULL THEN TO_CHAR(Extent1.BANK_DTL_APPR_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') ELSE '1900-01-01' END) AS BANK_DTL_APPR_DT , (CASE WHEN Extent2.BIC IS NOT NULL THEN Extent2.BIC ELSE ' ' END) AS BIC , (CASE WHEN Extent1.BANK_DTL_FPX_ID IS NOT NULL THEN Extent1.BANK_DTL_FPX_ID ELSE 0 END) AS BANK_DTL_FPX_ID, CASE WHEN Extent5.F_PX_ID IS NOT NULL THEN Extent5.CODE ELSE ' ' END AS FPX_CODE , TRIM(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO) SALES_ORD_NO , (CASE WHEN Extent1.BANK_DTL_RPT_AMT IS NOT NULL THEN Extent1.BANK_DTL_RPT_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS BANK_DTL_RPT_AMT , (CASE WHEN Extent1.BANK_DTL_REN_AMT IS NOT NULL THEN Extent1.BANK_DTL_REN_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS BANK_DTL_REN_AMT , (CASE WHEN LENGTH(Extent1.BANK_DTL_CRC_EXPR) < 4 THEN '0000' WHEN TO_DATE(Extent1.BANK_DTL_CRC_EXPR,'MMYY') > SYSDATE THEN Extent1.BANK_DTL_CRC_EXPR ELSE '0000' END) AS BANK_DTL_CRC_EXPR, (CASE WHEN Extent4.SRV_CNTRCT_ID IS NOT NULL THEN TRIM(Extent4.SRV_CNTRCT_REF_NO) ELSE ' ' END) AS SRV_CNTRCT_REF_NO , (CASE WHEN Extent4.SRV_CNTRCT_ID IS NOT NULL THEN SUBSTR(TRIM(Extent4.SRV_CNTRCT_REF_NO), 5, 7) || TRIM(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO) ELSE TRIM(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO) END) AS BILL_NO, (CASE WHEN NVL( Extent1.SVC_CNTRCT_ID,0) > 0 THEN (CASE WHEN LENGTH(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO) < 7 THEN SUBSTR(TRIM(Extent4.SRV_CNTRCT_REF_NO),5,7) || '0' || TRIM(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO) ELSE SUBSTR(TRIM(Extent4.SRV_CNTRCT_REF_NO),5,7) || TRIM(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO) END ) ELSE (CASE WHEN LENGTH(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO) = 7 AND SUBSTR(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO,0,1) = '0' THEN TRIM(SUBSTR(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO,2,LENGTH(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO))) ELSE TRIM(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO) END) END) AS CNTRCT_N_ORD_NO FROM PAY0042D Extent1 LEFT JOIN SYS0004M Extent2 ON Extent2.BANK_ID = Extent1.BANK_DTL_BANK_ID JOIN SAL0001D Extent3 ON Extent3.SALES_ORD_ID = Extent1.SALES_ORD_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0077D Extent4 ON Extent4.SRV_CNTRCT_ID = Extent1.SVC_CNTRCT_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0090C Extent5 ON Extent5.F_PX_ID = Extent1.BANK_DTL_FPX_ID WHERE Extent1.BANK_DTL_CTRL_ID = #{ctrlId}
) Z WHERE ROWNUM <= ( #{pageNo} * #{rowCount}) ORDER BY RNUM ASC) WHERE RNUM > ((#{pageNo} - 1) * #{rowCount})

SELECT
*
RNUM, PAGENO, BANK_DTL_GRP_ID, BANK_DTL_CTRL_ID, BANK_DTL_CRC_NO, BANK_DTL_CRC_NAME, (BANK_DTL_AMT * 100) BANK_DTL_AMT, TRX_DATE, RENT_PAY_CRC_EXPR, (TOT_AMT * 100) TOT_AMT, TOT_ITM , FILEDATE
FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM ,#{pageNo} as PAGENO ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS FILEDATE ,Z.* ,SUM(BANK_DTL_AMT) OVER (ORDER BY ROWNUM ROWS between 0 FOLLOWING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING) AS TOT_AMT ,COUNT(BANK_DTL_CTRL_ID) OVER (ORDER BY ROWNUM ROWS between 0 FOLLOWING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING) AS TOT_ITM FROM( SELECT Extent1.BANK_DTL_GRP_ID ,Extent1.BANK_DTL_CTRL_ID ,Extent1.BANK_DTL_CRC_NO ,Extent1.BANK_DTL_CRC_NAME
,Extent1.BANK_DTL_AMT
,Extent1.BANK_DTL_AMT
,(CASE WHEN LENGTH(Extent1.BANK_DTL_CRC_EXPR) < 4 THEN '0000' WHEN Extent1.BANK_DTL_CRC_EXPR like '00%' THEN '0000' WHEN TO_DATE(Extent1.BANK_DTL_CRC_EXPR,'MMYY') > SYSDATE THEN Extent1.BANK_DTL_CRC_EXPR ELSE '0000' END) AS RENT_PAY_CRC_EXPR
,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') TRX_DATE
,NVL( ( SELECT MAX(NVL(crc.CUST_CRC_EXPR, '0000')) RENT_PAY_CRC_EXPR FROM PAY0287D grp JOIN PAY0042D dtl on grp.BANK_DTL_GRP_ID = dtl.BANK_DTL_GRP_ID JOIN SAL0001D som ON som.SALES_ORD_ID = dtl.SALES_ORD_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0074D rs ON rs.SALES_ORD_ID = som.SALES_ORD_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0028D crc ON crc.CUST_CRC_ID = rs.CUST_CRC_ID AND rs.CUST_CRC_ID <> 0 WHERE som.STUS_CODE_ID <> 10 AND rs.MODE_ID = 131 AND som.APP_TYPE_ID = 66 AND rs.BANK_ID IN (19,34,17,28,18,31,16,23) AND dtl.BANK_DTL_GRP_ID = EXTENT1.BANK_DTL_GRP_ID ), '0000') AS RENT_PAY_CRC_EXPR
FROM PAY0287D Extent1 WHERE Extent1.BANK_DTL_CTRL_ID = #{ctrlId} ORDER BY Extent1.BANK_DTL_GRP_ID ) Z WHERE ROWNUM <= ( #{pageNo} * #{rowCount}) ORDER BY RNUM ASC ) WHERE RNUM > ((#{pageNo} - 1) * #{rowCount})

{ call SP_AUTO_DEBT_GENRT_CLM(#{new_claimType} , #{new_issueBank}, #{new_cardType}, #{new_debitDate}, #{userId}, #{new_claimDay}, #{new_ddtChnl}, #{p1, mode=OUT, jdbcType=CURSOR, javaType=ResultSet, resultMap=resultClaimMap}) }

{ call SP_AUTO_DEBT_GENRT_CLM_CCD(#{new_claimType} , #{new_merchantBank}, #{new_cardType}, #{new_debitDate}, #{userId}, #{new_issueBankId},#{mayBank},#{installMonth}, #{custType},#{monthType}, #{p1, mode=OUT, jdbcType=CURSOR, javaType=ResultSet, resultMap=resultClaimMap}) }

SELECT Extent1.BANK_DTL_ID , Extent1.BANK_DTL_CTRL_ID , Extent1.SALES_ORD_ID , Extent1.BANK_DTL_DR_DT , Extent1.BANK_DTL_DR_BANK_TYPE_ID , Extent1.BANK_DTL_DR_ACC_NO AS BANK_DTL_DR_ACC_NO, Extent1.BANK_DTL_DR_NAME , Extent1.BANK_DTL_AMT , Extent1.BANK_DTL_APPR_CODE , Extent1.BANK_DTL_OR_NO , Extent1.CRT_USER_ID , Extent1.CRT_DT , Extent1.UPD_USER_ID , Extent1.UPD_DT , Extent1.BANK_DTL_DR_NRIC , Extent1.BANK_DTL_OR_NO_RPT , Extent1.BANK_DTL_REN_STUS , Extent1.SVC_CNTRCT_ID , Extent1.BANK_DTL_BANK_ID , NVL(Extent1.BANK_APPV,0) AS BANK_APPV, NVL (Extent1.BANK_DTL_APPR_DT,TO_DATE ('1900-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS BANK_DTL_APPR_DT, NVL(Extent2.BIC,'') AS BIC, NVL(Extent1.BANK_DTL_FPX_ID,0) AS BANK_DTL_FPX_ID, NVL(Extent5.F_PX_ID,'') AS F_PX_ID, LTRIM(RTRIM(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO)) SALES_ORD_NO , NVL(Extent1.BANK_DTL_RPT_AMT,0) AS BANK_DTL_RPT_AMT, NVL(Extent1.BANK_DTL_REN_AMT,0) AS BANK_DTL_REN_AMT, NVL(Extent1.BANK_DTL_CRC_EXPR,'') AS BANK_DTL_CRC_EXPR, CASE WHEN Extent4.SRV_CNTRCT_ID IS NOT NULL THEN LTRIM(RTRIM(Extent4.SRV_CNTRCT_REF_NO)) ELSE ' ' END SRV_CNTRCT_REF_NO , CASE WHEN Extent4.SRV_CNTRCT_ID IS NOT NULL THEN SUBSTR(LTRIM(RTRIM(Extent4.SRV_CNTRCT_REF_NO)), 4 + 1, 7) || LTRIM(RTRIM(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO)) ELSE LTRIM(RTRIM(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO)) END CNTRCT_N_ORD_NO FROM PAY0042D Extent1 LEFT JOIN SYS0004M Extent2 ON Extent2.BANK_ID = Extent1.BANK_DTL_BANK_ID JOIN SAL0001D Extent3 ON Extent3.SALES_ORD_ID = Extent1.SALES_ORD_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0077D Extent4 ON Extent4.SRV_CNTRCT_ID = Extent1.SVC_CNTRCT_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0090C Extent5 ON Extent5.F_PX_ID = Extent1.BANK_DTL_FPX_ID WHERE Extent1.BANK_APPV = 2 AND Extent1.BANK_DTL_CTRL_ID = #{batchId} ORDER BY BANK_DTL_CTRL_ID

SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM PAY0039D Extent1 WHERE Extent1.STUS_ID = 1 AND Extent1.SCHDUL_DT = TO_DATE(#{new_scheduleDt},'DD/MM/YYYY') AND Extent1.PAY_MODE_ID = #{new_claimType}
AND Extent1.BANK_ID = #{new_issueBank}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAY0039D ( SCHDUL_ID, STUS_ID, PAY_MODE_ID, BANK_ID, CLM_DAY, SCHDUL_DT, CRT_USER_ID, CRT_DT, UPD_USER_ID, UPD_DT, DEBT_DT ) VALUES ( PAY0039D_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 1, NVL(#{new_claimType},0), NVL(#{new_issueBank},0), NVL(#{new_claimDay},0), TO_DATE(#{new_scheduleDt},'DD/MM/YYYY'), #{userId}, SYSDATE, #{userId}, SYSDATE, TO_DATE(#{new_debitDt},'DD/MM/YYYY') )
mapper.update: UPDATE PAY0039D SET STUS_ID = 8, UPD_USER_ID = #{userId}, UPD_DT = SYSDATE WHERE SCHDUL_ID = #{schdulId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAY0267M (CTRL_ID, FILE_NO, FILE_PATH,FILE_NAME,FILE_TYPE) VALUES (#{ctrlId},(select nvl(max(file_no),0)+1 from PAY0267M where CTRL_ID = #{ctrlId}),#{filePath},#{fileName},#{fileType})
mapper.select: SELECT ID , CTRL_FILE_NM , CTRL_DT_FMT , CTRL_FILE_EXT , CTRL_SUB_PATH , CTRL_EMAIL , CTRL_EMAIL_SUBJ , CTRL_EMAIL_TEXT , CTRL_ZIP FROM PAY0289M WHERE CTRL_IS_CRC = #{ctrlIsCrc} AND CTRL_BANK_ID = #{ctrlBankId} AND DISB = 0 ORDER BY CTRL_SET
SELECT CODE FROM SYS0004M WHERE BANK_ID = #{bnkCde} AND STUS_CODE_ID = '1' AND ROWNUM <= 1

SELECT CTRL_DAT_TYP , CTRL_DAT_LGTH , CTRL_DAT_FMT , CTRL_DAT , CTRL_DELIMETER , CTRL_PAD , CTRL_PAD_VAL , CTRL_RMK FROM PAY0290M WHERE ID = #{id} AND CTRL_PART = #{part} AND DISB = 0 ORDER BY CTRL_SEQ
SELECT A.STUS_CODE_ID CODE_ID, A.NAME CODE_NAME FROM SYS0038M A WHERE A.STUS_CODE_ID IN ('1', '4', '8') ORDER BY A.STUS_CODE_ID
SELECT A.CODE CODE_ID, A.CODE_NAME CODE_NAME FROM SYS0094M A WHERE A.IND = #{ind} AND A.DISB = 0 ORDER BY CODE_ID

SELECT B.BANK_ID CODE_ID, B.CODE || ' - ' || B.NAME CODE_NAME FROM SYS0093M A JOIN SYS0004M B ON A.BANK_ID = B.BANK_ID WHERE B.STUS_CODE_ID = 1 AND SYSDATE BETWEEN A.EFF_DT AND A.EXP_DT AND A.BANK_CHNL = 'C' AND A.DISB = 0 ORDER BY B.NAME
SELECT A.CODE CODE_ID, A.CODE_NAME CODE_NAME FROM SYS0094M A WHERE A.IND = #{ind} AND A.DISB = 0 AND A.CODE != 134 ORDER BY CODE_ID

{ call SP_AUTO_DEBT_GENRT_CLM_VRESCUE(#{new_claimType} , #{new_issueBank}, #{new_cardType}, #{new_debitDate}, #{userId}, #{new_claimDay}, #{new_ddtChnl}, #{new_merchantBank}, #{p1, mode=OUT, jdbcType=CURSOR, javaType=ResultSet, resultMap=resultClaimMap}) }
mapper.update:
UPDATE SAL0074D SET GRACE_PERIOD = 0, DEDUCT_ACC_ID = 0
WHERE RENT_PAY_ID = #{rentPayId}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO PAY0330T (ORDER_NO,ORDER_ID)
SELECT ORDER_NO , EXT1.SALES_ORD_ID ORDER_ID FROM ( SELECT #{item.orderNo} ORDER_NO FROM DUAL ) JOIN SAL0001D EXT1 ON EXT1.SALES_ORD_NO = ORDER_NO
mapper.select: SELECT A.CTRL_ID, A.MONTH_TYPE, A.CTRL_TOT_ITM, A.CRT_DT AS ORD_CRT, TO_CHAR(A.CRT_DT,'DD-MM-YYYY') AS CRT_DT, NVL(A.CTRL_BILL_AMT,0) AS TARGET_AMT, NVL(A.CTRL_TOT_SUCCES,0) AS TOTAL_SUCCESS, NVL(A.CTRL_BILL_PAY_AMT,0) AS RECEIVED_AMT, B.CODE AS STATUS FROM PAY0041D A JOIN SYS0038M B ON A.CTRL_STUS_ID = B.STUS_CODE_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.CTRL_IS_CRC = 1 AND A.CTRL_GROUP = 1 AND A.VRESCUE = 0 AND A.MONTH_TYPE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ORD_CRT DESC

SELECT A.BATCH_ID, B.BATCH_NO, A.ORD_NO, A.REMARK, C.CODE AS STATUS, D.USER_NAME, A.CRT_DT FROM SAL0348D A JOIN SAL0347D B ON B.BATCH_ID = A.BATCH_ID JOIN SYS0038M C ON C.STUS_CODE_ID = B.BATCH_STUS JOIN SYS0047M D ON D.USER_ID = A.CRT_USER_ID WHERE A.BATCH_ID = #{batchId}
SELECT NVL(MAX(BATCH_ID) + 1, 1) AS BATCH_ID FROM SAL0347D
SELECT BATCH_NO FROM SAL0347D WHERE BATCH_ID = #{batchId}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO SAL0348D( BATCH_ID ,ORD_NO ,REMARK ,CRT_USER_ID ,CRT_DT ,UPD_USER_ID ,UPD_DT )
SELECT batchId , ordNo , remark , crtUserId , crtDt , updUserId , updDt FROM (
SELECT
#{batchId} batchId ,#{item.ordNo} ordNo ,#{item.remark} remark ,#{item.crtUserId} crtUserId ,SYSDATE crtDt ,#{item.updUserId} updUserId ,SYSDATE updDt FROM DUAL
)
mapper.select: SELECT C.RENT_PAY_ID FROM SAL0348D A JOIN SAL0001D B ON B.SALES_ORD_NO = A.ORD_NO JOIN SAL0074D C ON C.SALES_ORD_ID = B.SALES_ORD_ID WHERE C.DEDUCT_ACC_ID IS NOT NULL AND A.BATCH_ID = #{batchId}

SELECT B.SALES_ORD_NO, C.MODE_ID, B.STUS_CODE_ID FROM SAL0348D A JOIN SAL0001D B ON B.SALES_ORD_NO = A.ORD_NO JOIN SAL0074D C ON C.SALES_ORD_ID = B.SALES_ORD_ID WHERE A.BATCH_ID = #{batchId} AND C.MODE_ID NOT IN (130)

SELECT Extent1.BANK_DTL_CTRL_ID BATCH_NO, TO_CHAR(Extent1.BANK_DTL_DR_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') DEBIT_DT, (CASE WHEN NVL( Extent1.SVC_CNTRCT_ID,0) > 0 THEN (CASE WHEN LENGTH(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO) < 7 THEN SUBSTR(TRIM(Extent4.SRV_CNTRCT_REF_NO),5,7) || '0' || TRIM(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO) ELSE SUBSTR(TRIM(Extent4.SRV_CNTRCT_REF_NO),5,7) || TRIM(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO) END ) ELSE TRIM(Extent3.SALES_ORD_NO) END) ORD_NO, Extent1.BANK_DTL_DR_ACC_NO ACCOUNT_NO, Extent1.BANK_DTL_DR_NAME ACCOUNT_NAME, EXTENT6.NAME ISSUE_BANK, (CASE WHEN NVL( Extent1.SVC_CNTRCT_ID,0) > 0 AND pay.MODE_ID <> 130 THEN (SELECT Extent9.CODE_NAME FROM SAL0074D extent7 LEFT JOIN SAL0028D extent8 ON extent8.CUST_CRC_ID = extent7.CUST_CRC_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M extent9 ON extent8.CARD_TYPE_ID = EXTENT9.CODE_ID WHERE extent7.SALES_ORD_ID = extent1.SALES_ORD_ID AND extent7.SVC_CNTRCT_ID = Extent1.SVC_CNTRCT_ID AND Extent1.BANK_DTL_CTRL_ID = #{ctrlId}) WHEN NVL( Extent1.SVC_CNTRCT_ID,0) = 0 AND pay.MODE_ID <> 130 THEN (SELECT Extent9.CODE_NAME FROM SAL0074D extent7 LEFT JOIN SAL0028D extent8 ON extent8.CUST_CRC_ID = extent7.CUST_CRC_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M extent9 ON extent8.CARD_TYPE_ID = EXTENT9.CODE_ID WHERE extent7.SALES_ORD_ID = extent1.SALES_ORD_ID AND extent7.SVC_CNTRCT_ID = 0 AND Extent1.BANK_DTL_CTRL_ID = #{ctrlId}) WHEN NVL( Extent1.SVC_CNTRCT_ID,0) > 0 AND pay.MODE_ID = 130 THEN (SELECT Extent9.CODE_NAME FROM SAL0236D aaa LEFT JOIN SAL0028D extent8 ON extent8.CUST_CRC_ID = aaa.CRC_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M extent9 ON extent8.CARD_TYPE_ID = EXTENT9.CODE_ID WHERE aaa.SALES_ORD_ID = extent1.SALES_ORD_ID AND aaa.SRV_CNTRCT_ID = Extent1.SVC_CNTRCT_ID AND Extent1.BANK_DTL_CTRL_ID = #{ctrlId} AND ROWNUM <= 1) WHEN NVL( Extent1.SVC_CNTRCT_ID,0) = 0 AND pay.MODE_ID = 130 THEN (SELECT Extent9.CODE_NAME FROM SAL0236D aaa LEFT JOIN SAL0028D extent8 ON extent8.CUST_CRC_ID = aaa.CRC_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M extent9 ON extent8.CARD_TYPE_ID = EXTENT9.CODE_ID WHERE aaa.SALES_ORD_ID = extent1.SALES_ORD_ID AND aaa.SRV_CNTRCT_ID = 0 AND Extent1.BANK_DTL_CTRL_ID = #{ctrlId} AND ROWNUM <= 1) END) AS CARD_TYPE , Extent1.BANK_DTL_AMT AMOUNT, Extent1.BANK_DTL_APPR_CODE APPROVE_CODE, Extent1.BANK_DTL_GRP_ID REFERENCE_NO FROM PAY0042D Extent1 JOIN SAL0001D Extent3 ON Extent3.SALES_ORD_ID = Extent1.SALES_ORD_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0077D Extent4 ON Extent4.SRV_CNTRCT_ID = Extent1.SVC_CNTRCT_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0004M Extent6 ON Extent1.BANK_DTL_DR_BANK_TYPE_ID = Extent6.BANK_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0074D pay ON pay.SALES_ORD_ID = Extent3.SALES_ORD_ID and pay.SVC_CNTRCT_ID = Extent1.SVC_CNTRCT_ID WHERE Extent1.BANK_DTL_CTRL_ID = #{ctrlId} ORDER BY Extent1.BANK_DTL_CTRL_ID
